envy.question: Have I secretly resented the success and blessings enjoyed by others, often wishing they would be deprived of them?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

extracted_data_phrases: whether through online platforms or face - to - face conversations
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and use inappropriate language that offended others in my social interactions, whether through online platforms or face-to-face conversations?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in using language that was unbecoming to others , particularly in social settings or
with those I have a professional or familial relationship with
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control in using language that was unbecoming to others, particularly in social settings or when interacting with those I have a professional or familial relationship with?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
particularly during social gatherings and events where excess is often present
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, particularly during social gatherings and events where excess is often present?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what is reasonable
gluttony.question: Did you indulge in eating or drinking beyond what is reasonable, demonstrating an excessive love for worldly pleasures?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in my eating and drinking habits
gluttony.question: Did I use food or drink to excess, neglecting moderation in my eating and drinking habits?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: to family and those in need
prodigality.question: Have I been excessively and wastefully risking financial resources entrusted to me, thereby neglecting my responsibilities to family and those in need?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: in using my resources to pursue recreational activities , such that they take precedence over my financial obligations or family needs
over my financial obligations or family needs
prodigality.question: Have I been excessively wasteful in using my resources to pursue recreational activities, such that they take precedence over my financial obligations or family needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing others' private affairs, even if they were true, through conversations or online discussions?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I enjoyed discussing private affairs or faults, even if true, that are shared among friends or acquaintances?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in work that compromised my rest on a Sunday , when it could have been avoided without any significant burden or consequences
on a Sunday , when it could have been avoided without any significant burden or consequences
without any significant burden or consequences
impiety.question: Did I engage in work that compromised my rest on a Sunday, when it could have been avoided without any significant burden or consequences?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

extracted_data_phrases: on Sunday , which is designated for rest and worship
impiety.question: Did I unnecessarily occupy time on Sunday, which is designated for rest and worship?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

extracted_data_phrases: especially towards those closest to me ,
anger.question: Have I nursed anger in my relationships, especially towards those closest to me, rather than seeking reconciliation?
anger.description: Uncontrolled anger corrupts our own heart, damages our relationship with both God and neighbor.
